message: Hello Geeks, After the Bad news of closing TestFlight today and the acquisition from Apple, do you guys have any other good option to use for testing? Thanks

data.message: Use the iTunes Connect prerelease interface, it is a little more time consuming because you need to submit your App for beta testing if you want to test on External testers (users not enlisted as Technical or Admin users in your iTunes Connect account), but that's the way now :(
